item.title: Home 32

item.content:encoded:
[rev_slider alias="niches_09_smartglasse" slidertitle="Home 32 smartglasses"][/rev_slider]

Smart Glasses

smarter eyewear. built by athletes for athletes

Improve

Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

Run smarter

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor

Lightweight. Advanced Technology.

Smart glasses is designed to feel like your existing cycling glasses, which is why they are lightweight, aerodynamic and designed with human ergonomics in mind. display camera frame power control audio

protect your eyes
in style

At a basic level, the functions as glasses, meaning you will be able to order the lenses you depend on, whether they are prescription

Learn More

Product Specs

Weight and Dimensions

  • Product Dimensions: 160x180x50mm
  • Product Weight: 65gr
  • Vista Module: 45 x 12 x 5.5 mm

display

  • Widescreen WQVGA 16:9 microdisplay
  • Sunlight readable – high contrast
  • Virtual image appears is 3x larger than typical bike computer
  • Field of View (FOV) 10.68

Battery

  • Integrated battery
  • Battery type: Lithium ion
  • Rechargeable via MicroUSB connector
  • Battery life: 5 hours typical use

Connectivity

  • Bluetooth sensors (BLE)
  • ANT+ sensors
  • Micro USB – recharging port

Get 10% off
your first order

As a welcome to all our new customers we have a special code which you can use to get 10% off your first order.

$545.0 - buy it now
